epd_metadata.epd_owner_address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
epd_metadata.epd_produced_by_address: Level 3, Greenhouse, 180 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000 Australia
epd_metadata.epd_process_certified_by_address: Suite 2600, 101 Marietta St NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30303, USA
epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)
epd_metadata.cpc_description: Articles of concrete, cement and plaster

product_description.product_use: General use concrete (e.g. foot path, slabs, foundations, normal class)

classification.normal_class: designed for everyday applications such as residential and commercial foundations, driveways and footpaths
classification.special_class: high-strength/high-performance concrete, high durability, marine application, post-tensioned, high-pumpability, super workable, piling concrete, architectural off-form finishes and decorative applications

product_description.dangerous_goods_classification: Non-Dangerous Goods according to the Australian Code for the Transport of Dangerous Goods by Road and Rail
product_description.hazardous_substances: None of the products contain substances listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern for authorisation
product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options modules A4-A5, modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.reference_service_life: Not specified (scope is cradle to delivery)

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight at quarry and m3 of concrete at batching plant; economic allocation when physical not possible

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to/from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered via trucks and ships without packaging

data_quality.geographic_representativeness: Good or very good for all data sources
data_quality.temporal_representativeness: All data updated within 10 years as required by PCR 2019:14

installation.assumptions: Based on industrial expertise and GCCA tool
installation.activities: Pouring concrete from ready-mix truck and pump, manual finishing; excludes pre-installation activities

end_of_life.control: No control by Holcim over end-of-life fate

deconstruction.process: Physical drilling and removal using hydraulic excavator

benefits_module_D.description: Environmental benefits from reuse, recovery, and recycling of deconstructed concrete
benefits_module_D.recycled_aggregate_use: Recycled aggregate replaces virgin coarse aggregate depending on product performance requirements

targets.2030: Embodied carbon of all construction materials to be at least 40% lower
targets.2050: All new construction materials to be net zero

carbonation.description: Natural process where concrete absorbs CO2 from atmosphere through chemical reaction
carbonation.consideration: Not included in this EPD; recommended to consider in whole-of-life building studies per BS EN 16757:2017
carbonation.impact: Can partly offset CO2 emitted during cement manufacturing

allocation_approach.fly_ash: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included
allocation_approach.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Allocated economically due to significant economic value
allocation_approach.silica_fume: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included
allocation_approach.secondary_data: AusLCI LCA database allocation approach adopted as default for secondary data and processes

additional_info.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)
data_sources: Invoices and metered data for electricity, diesel, LPG, water, explosives
references: Australian Life Cycle Inventory Database Initiative (2023)
Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water (2023)
disclaimers: Results are relative statements and do not indicate endpoints, thresholds, safety margins or risks
Certain environmental impact indicators have high uncertainties or limited experience
Ionizing radiation indicator excludes effects from nuclear accidents, occupational exposure, and radioactive waste disposal underground

contact_information.address: Level 40/100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
